favourite.article: O Lord Jesus, Your love are how dear and near to me.
Forever I'm with Jesus the great Master.
This song is so inspiring, life would have been nothing with Jesus. I'm forever grateful to Him.
Love this hymn. It speaks of the love of Jesus.
I enjoy this hymn to the tune of Hymn 395, O Jesus Christ grow Thou in me.
Very good, but there seems to be a bit elongated rest that you have added after the first line that I've never heard on this song before this.
What would life be like without the Comforter? I am forever thankful to Christ, our life.
We could go to Him for rest, to lay down our head on Him. We may come to Him weary, and worn, and sad but He can make us glad!
I heard this song the first time the day before my sister died. The first lines were a real comfort to me.

Such wonderful words!
"I heard the voice of Jesus say, "Behold, I freely give The living water: thirsty one, Stoop down, and drink, and live.""
I like the song because it reminds me to turn to Jesus in every aspect of my life.... happy or sad, lonely or glad... He's always here to remind us that He will never leave us.
